title: Create complete example projects with specs
description: Create examples/complete-projects/ with 3 complete examples: simple-todo-app, pension-calculator, and research-project. Each should include the original spec, the generated environment, and a README explaining what was generated and why. This shows users the end-to-end result and builds understanding of the system.
completion_notes: All subtasks completed successfully. Created three complete examples demonstrating Base, Power Query, and Research templates with original specifications, generated environments, and explanatory READMEs.
notes:
